website_summaries.verdict: These are Castelli's most popular bib shorts, designed specifically for racing.
pros: The dimpled fabric on the thighs is designed to boost aerodynamics
Fabric of inner thigh stretches for comfortable fit
Large leg gripper keeps shorts in place without putting too much pressure on thighs
cons: Not everyone likes the updated chamois

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfterable
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a month or two, and it is definitely conferrable. I'm using it 4 times a week for 1.5 to 4 hours / day (3-4 hours once a week). The suit is very conferrable, and fits very well (it is expectedly tight). The only complaint is I've developed a small hole in the back webbing, which I would not expect given how shortly I've had it. I'll update this if I can remember if this hole becomes a bigger issue.
customer_reviews.author: aoeu

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way too small
customer_reviews.text: Castelli bib shorts are expensive but great quality. Their sizing is terrible. Way undersized. I'm 5'10" , 175lbs. I bought a large, too small so I sent it back. I ordered an X-Lg. Still too tight. I'm not that big. Figure out how to get the sizing right before you buy. I got stuck with restocking fee.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Boy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...Just Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate these high enough. When I was riding with my friends, I kept telling them that these bibs were the greatest thing I'd purchased. Riding 25-30 miles and not even a HINT of pain. And the cool part is how they fit your thighs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Poor sizing.  Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7 and 170#. I ordered a LARGE and I couldn’t come Close to getting them over my thighs. I am an athlete but not a body builder. Poor sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Sizing/Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a size M in the previous versions of the Aero Race Bib, because of the numerous comment to size up...I did. The size L had too much fabric and irritated my skin where it would bunch up (soft spots). My opinion is the previous chamois pads are more comfortable/firm than these. I recommend buying true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Javian

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and well made. If you bought medium in most other makes you would require a large in Castelli and even that is tight.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Too tight even going a size up. quality is just not there, shoulder straps have frayed after one wash. A big disappointment for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Product well made but At 67inches weighing 148# but the medium bib would not get over my legs.
customer_reviews.text: Product looked ok but the medium size was incredibly too small.
customer_reviews.author: Art Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great bib shorts. Chamois is fantastic. Normally a Large, ordered XL. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Schlick

customer_reviews.title: Seams coming apart
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty comfortable but the quality of the product is really bad. The seams have started coming apart after just one wash. I was expecting better after spending over $200 on the product.
customer_reviews.author: mahatma

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the fabric and the tight fit. It felt like a second skin. The sizing is off and knowing this beforehand I ordered one size up. Very happy with the product. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: I have spent thousands on bibs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I have tried so many and spent so much, and wow. these are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Aber

product_meta.title: Castelli Men's Free Aero Race 4 Bibshort
product_meta.description: The Free Aero Race short is the all-around race short Castelli supplies to Team Sky, as well as all race teams they’ve sponsored since 2007. But that’s not enough of a reason for you to just go out and buy a pair. Since these guys ride over 30,000 kilometers per year, we consider them ideal testers and continuously solicit their feedback. The difference is that we actually listen to them. And the good thing for you is that the pros are looking for comfortable shorts too, so this short is made to be minimalist and fast, but without sacrificing all-day comfort. For this year Castelli has made subtle but important refinements. The seat pad has been updated with a softer, stretchier and totally seamless top layer. The leg gripper is also stretchier and grips better. The bib straps are both lighter and more comfortable while giving better support.
feature_bullets: Material: [legs] Vortex dimpled fabric, [inner thighs] Forza fabric with 38% Lycra
